name: NALOGI 2
description: NALOGI 2 - new satirical game in the genre of RPG. The emperor became emperor after the election. Again. For eternity. PAY TAXES!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 Ghz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 185 Ghz or faster Memory: 25 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 2 GB available space
